description: This file declares external functions related to obtaining parameter values and instance numbers for a data model in a broadband or network device environment, specifically in the context of TR-181 and DSL Home models.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueUlong
methods.description: Retrieves an unsigned long parameter value by name.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueString
methods.description: Retrieves a string parameter value by name, with buffer and size for output.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueBool
methods.description: Retrieves a boolean parameter value by name.

methods.name: CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex
methods.description: Retrieves an instance number based on object name and index.
